sentences.en: a means of overcoming genuine grievances
sentences.cn: 化解委屈的一个办法

sentences.en: anyone who has a legitimate grievance against the company
sentences.cn: 凡是有正当理由对公司感到不满的人

sentences.en: He called me an ungrateful wretch and nourished the grievance to the end of his days.
sentences.cn: 他说我是个忘恩负义的无耻小人,直到死的时候他还是心怀不满.

sentences.en: He will not easily forget his grievance.
sentences.cn: 他不会轻易忘掉他的委屈.

sentences.en: He'd been harbouring / nursing a grievance against his boss.
sentences.cn: 他一直对老板心怀不满.

sentences.en: I smiled, but I am certain my smile looked like a grievance.
sentences.cn: 我笑了, 可是我相信只是一声苦笑而已.

sentences.en: I'll do that sheriff, but Cavin seemed to have a grievance of his own.
sentences.cn: 我会的治安官, 但是凯文好象有苦衷.

sentences.en: Is there any solution to the grievance?
sentences.cn: 对于那些不平[抱怨]有什么解决方法 吗 ?

sentences.en: Mulcaster had kept silent about his grievance.
sentences.cn: 马尔卡斯特对他自己的冤屈一直沉默.

sentences.en: Not understanding what he was saying, I continued with my grievance.
sentences.cn: 我并未听明白他的话, 心里更加气愤不已.

sentences.en: Nursing a grievance makes you bitter.
sentences.cn: 积怨在心只能使你不愉快.

sentences.en: Our anger was like the anger of children, passing quickly from one petty grievance to another.
sentences.cn: 我们生气就象孩子生气一样, 从一件小小的不平之事很快过渡到另一件事上.

sentences.en: She will use this as a peg to hang her grievance on.
sentences.cn: 她会利用这个作为发泄怨愤的借口.

sentences.en: The main grievance of the drivers is the imposition of higher fees for driving licences.
sentences.cn: 让驾驶员深感不满的是驾驶执照收费的提高。

sentences.en: the sense of grievance which characterized him as a young man
sentences.cn: 他年轻时惯有的不满情绪

sentences.en: The teachers’ contract established a grievance procedure .
sentences.cn: 教师合同建立了一个申诉程序。

sentences.en: There must be an opportunity for both sides to air their grievances .
sentences.cn: 一定要有一个机会让双方都说出心中的不满。

sentences.en: They had a legitimate grievance.
sentences.cn: 他们的抱怨是合乎情理的。

sentences.en: They were supported, perhaps, by the poorer class with a grievance.
sentences.cn: 他们也许受到心怀不满的贫民阶级的拥护.

sentences.en: White, in his new capacity , was anxious to exploit his grievance against Golconda.
sentences.cn: 怀特有了新的职权, 急于发泄他对戈尔康达的不满.

phrases.tran_cn: 冤屈投诉程序；苦情处理制度；抱怨程序；申诉程序

trans.tran_en: a belief that you have been treated unfairly, or an unfair situation or event that affects and upsets you
